section.section: The State Archivist may appoint an Assistant State Archivist.

The Assistant State Archivist has the powers and duties of the State Archivist:
to the extent delegated by the State Archivist;
if the office of the State Archivist is vacant; and
if for any other reason the State Archivist is unable to perform the duties of office.

text.section: The State Archivist may employ other staff in accordance with the State budget.
